headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DRAPER DOWNER, HARRIETTE "HEIDI." FEBRUARY 2

snippet: DRAPER DOWNER--Harriette "Heidi." February 2, 2016. A passionate filmmaker with great joie de vivre. She is survived by children Elizabeth and Ahab and four grandchildren. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DRAPER DOWNER--Harriette "Heidi." February 2, 2016. A passionate filmmaker with great joie de vivre. She is survived by children Elizabeth and Ahab and four grandchildren. 1/3
